name: arxiv_scrape_recent
description: Browse recent arXiv papers in a category.

steps.code: const papers = []; document.querySelectorAll('dt').forEach((dt, i) => { if (i < 20) { const idEl = dt.querySelector('a[href*="/abs/"]'); const dd = dt.nextElementSibling; const titleEl = dd?.querySelector('.list-title'); const authorsEl = dd?.querySelector('.list-authors'); papers.push({ arxiv_id: idEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: idEl?.href || '', title: titleEl?.textContent?.replace('Title:', '')?.trim() || '', authors: authorsEl?.textContent?.replace('Authors:', '')?.trim()?.slice(0, 200) || '' }); } }); return { category: '{{category}}', paper_count: papers.length, papers };
steps.name: results
steps.label: Extract recent papers
